long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to view up to 3 vids at the same time in the side panel. 

Each video pane is fully resizable, allowing for a custom viewing experience tailored to your needs. Whether you're following tutorials while coding, catching up on news, or simply enjoying a mix of your favorite YouTube channels, this extension allows you to maximise content consumption. ðŸ˜€

To add a video to the sidepanel simply drag a link from youtube to the drop area.
